description:
He is another Dragon Knight who accompanied Atori and Tobi in leaving La`cryma. After removing his pipeline, he remarked that if he would disappear in a peaceful timespace then he would be happy.
Fukurou and Karasu travelled to Haruka`s timespace to pursue them, and when Atori ordered Isuka to destroy Haruka, Karasu was forced to kill him. Isuka`s last words were that he could now be at peace. Isuka`s spin weapon consists of him charging energy into his fists and unleasing a blast of energy shaped like a fist towards his target.
name: Isuka
